mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.ID, m.title, m.overview, m.genre_ids, COALESCE(k.keyword, '') AS keyword FROM ( SELECT * FROM movie WHERE overview != '' AND genre_ids != '' AND genre_ids IS NOT NULL ORDER BY popularity DESC ) m LEFT JOIN keywords k ON m.ID = k.movie_id CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 1 AS n UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 ) n WHERE m.ID != #{ID} AND k.keyword != '' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM movie m2 WHERE m2.ID = #{ID} AND FIND_IN_SET(TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(m2.genre_ids, ',', n.n), ',', -1)), m.genre_ids) > 0 ) LIMIT 1000;
SELECT m.ID, m.title, m.overview, m.genre_ids, COALESCE(k.keyword, '') AS keyword FROM movie m LEFT JOIN keywords k ON m.ID = k.movie_id WHERE m.ID = #{ID}
SELECT ID,title,poster_path FROM movie WHERE title = #{title} LIMIT 1
